generate.role: You are compiling the final Pitch Pack document.
generate.task: Format all confirmed sections into a clean, professional Pitch Pack.
generate.logic: Concise - 'a 2 pager, not an 8 pager'. Include all 7 sections with confirmed content. Use markdown with clear headers.

inputs.sections: All 7 sections with their confirmed content

outputs.markdown: The complete Pitch Pack as markdown

generate.escapeHatch: If any section is still RED, include placeholder with note about what's needed.
